issues.description: Hero CTA may not be visible above fold on mobile with 2-column layout collapse
issues.rationale: 60/40 desktop grid stacking on mobile could push primary CTA below fold, killing conversions

issues.description: Pricing cards lack risk reversal messaging to overcome purchase hesitation
issues.rationale: Equal-height cards focus on features but miss addressing buyer anxiety and commitment fears

issues.description: Proof bar placement after hero creates trust gap during initial 8-second evaluation
issues.rationale: Trust signals arrive too late in scan pattern, after user already forms first impression

issues.description: Audit log pattern buried after How It Works reduces conversion impact
issues.rationale: Critical observability proof placed too far down page when users need trust signals earlier

issues.description: Section reordering creates 5-section scroll fatigue before reaching pricing
issues.rationale: Hero→Proof→Problem→HowItWorks→Audit→Pricing sequence may exhaust mobile users before conversion

issues.description: 75ch max line length may be too wide for mobile scanning comfort
issues.rationale: Optimal mobile reading is 45-65ch; 75ch could slow comprehension on smaller screens

issues.description: Secondary CTA as outline button lacks sufficient visual weight for fallback action
issues.rationale: Outline style may be too subtle, reducing conversion opportunities for hesitant users

issues.description: 40px section spacing may feel cramped on mobile between compressed content blocks
issues.rationale: Mobile needs more breathing room between sections to maintain scannability and reduce fatigue

issues.description: Pricing card swipe behavior lacks clear affordance indicators for mobile users
issues.rationale: Users may not discover horizontal scrolling without visible scroll hints or pagination dots

issues.description: Audit log footer placement reduces visibility when users need observability proof
issues.rationale: Footer location makes trust signal discoverable only after full page scroll completion

suggestedFixes.fix: Set mobile hero stack with CTA above fold: hero content max 60vh, CTA positioned at 50vh minimum
suggestedFixes.rationale: Guarantees primary conversion action stays visible during critical first impression window

suggestedFixes.fix: Add risk reversal text under each pricing card: '30-day money-back guarantee' with 14px font
suggestedFixes.rationale: Addresses purchase anxiety directly at decision point with concrete safety assurance

suggestedFixes.fix: Move proof bar inside hero section as subtitle: 3 compact proof chips at 12px below headline
suggestedFixes.rationale: Integrates trust signals into 8-second evaluation window without adding scroll friction

suggestedFixes.fix: Relocate audit preview to Problem/Solution section as inline proof element with 2 log entries
suggestedFixes.rationale: Places observability evidence where users question reliability, earlier in conversion flow

suggestedFixes.fix: Compress to 4 sections: Hero+Proof → Problem+AuditPreview → HowItWorks → Pricing+CTA
suggestedFixes.rationale: Reduces scroll fatigue while maintaining narrative flow and trust-building sequence

suggestedFixes.fix: Set responsive max line length: 65ch desktop, 50ch tablet, 45ch mobile for optimal readability
suggestedFixes.rationale: Optimizes reading comfort across devices while maintaining desktop content density

suggestedFixes.fix: Style secondary CTA as filled button with 80% primary color opacity and same 48px height
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains visual hierarchy while giving secondary action sufficient weight for conversions

suggestedFixes.fix: Increase mobile section spacing to 60px vertical with 20px horizontal margins for breathing room
suggestedFixes.rationale: Improves mobile scanning comfort and reduces cognitive load between content sections

suggestedFixes.fix: Add horizontal scroll indicators: subtle gradient fade + pagination dots below mobile cards
suggestedFixes.rationale: Provides clear affordance for horizontal navigation without cluttering card design

suggestedFixes.fix: Duplicate audit log preview in hero sidebar: 2 recent actions with timestamps, 16px font
suggestedFixes.rationale: Makes observability proof visible during initial evaluation without relying on footer discovery
